t.id, t.ent_number, t.address, t.pay_type, t.prepay_rate, t.pick_rate, t.warranty_rate, t.pay_date, t.ticket_date, t.template_type, t.template_url, t.warranty_date, t.enable, t.check_status, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.edit_user, t.edit_time
mapper.select:
select
,info.ent_name ,account.account_name ,account.bank_name ,account.bank_no from enterprise_purchase_template t left join enterprise_info info on info.ent_number=t.ent_number left join enterprise_account account on account.ent_number=t.ent_number and account.account_type=1 and account.isdelete=0
order by ent_number desc
